# ListFormatStyle.Width

**Enumeration**

The type representing the width of a list.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Width
```

## Overview

The possible values of a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ListFormatStyle/width-swift.property] are `standard`, `short`, and `narrow`.

## Widths

- **ListFormatStyle.Width.standard**: Specifies a standard list style.
- **ListFormatStyle.Width.short**: Specifies a short list style.
- **ListFormatStyle.Width.narrow**: Specifies a narrow list style, the shortest list style.

## Modifying a list format style

- **width**: The size of the list.
- **listType**: The type of the list.
- **ListFormatStyle.ListType**: A type that describes whether the returned list contains cumulative or alternative elements.
- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting items in the list.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
